metadata.title: Large-scale evolutionary surveillance of the 2009 H1N1 influenza A virus using resequencing arrays

abstract.original_text: In April 2009, a new influenza A (H1N1 2009) virus emerged that rapidly spread around the world. While current variants of this virus have caused widespread disease, particularly in vulnerable

sentences.segment_text: In April 2009 , a new influenza A ( H1N1 2009 ) virus emerged that rapidly spread around the world .
While current variants of this virus have caused widespread disease , particularly in vulnerable
